content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Ryanah, thank you for considering my apartment in Mannheim. The price for this 25 square meter apartment is negotiable. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price. Is that possible?

I am a student, I am dependable and responsible. I want to be on good terms with my landlord.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
As a landlord, my goal is to maximize my gains. However, I am open to discussing a rental price that is fair and reasonable for both parties. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I would suggest a rental price of 600 Euros per month. This price takes into account the cost of living in Mannheim and the value of the apartment. It is also competitive with similar properties in the area.

As a student, I understand the importance of being on good terms with your landlord. I would be happy to work with you to find a rental price that works for both of us. Let's discuss this further and see if we can come to an agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 600 Euros per month.

Thank you for considering me as a tenant. I am looking forward to moving into the apartment.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
I am glad to hear that you agree to the rental price of 600 Euros per month. I am happy to have you as a tenant and look forward to working with you.

Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns during the move-in process. I will do my best to ensure that everything runs smoothly.

Welcome to Mannheim!
name: Heinrich Heine
